'''Gold'''是美国动画《[[RWBY]]》第一季Vol.1第3话ED。

== 歌曲 ==
<flashmp3>Gold.mp3</flashmp3>

I'll make it all come true

Everything you need

Is all I'll have for you

I'm forever

Always by your side

Whenever you need a friend

I'm never far behind
